title: Sweet Tea and Deviled Eggs
description: Adults view kids as just so much background noise until something goes wrong--then they make life changing decisions without even asking the kid what she wants. It's all done in the name of "we know what's best." What's a kid to do?Well, if you're the kid, you think about it, view the options and figure out what you think is the best outcome. You make a plan and carry it out.If you're careful, you can even get away with it.A short work of crime from our Fingerprints line.
author: Sandra Murphy
